summary: This document is a forwarded email from April 17, 2019, containing a link to an NBC News article about Alan Dershowitz being sued for defamation in connection with Epstein sex abuse claims. It appears to be internal communication sharing news coverage.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Mentioned as being sued for defamation in connection with Epstein sex abuse claims, based on an NBC News article.

events.title: Dershowitz Defamation Lawsuit Coverage
events.description: An NBC News article reports that Alan Dershowitz is being sued for defamation in connection with Epstein sex abuse claims.

keyFacts: Alan Dershowitz was sued for defamation in connection with Epstein sex abuse claims as of April 2019.
The document is an internal email forwarding a news article link about the lawsuit.
The source of the information is an NBC News article dated April 17, 2019.
